@graph.headline: Noderr Protocol: Decentralized Infrastructure Whitepaper
@graph.description: Technical whitepaper detailing the architecture, security, and economics of Noderr Protocol

acceptedAnswer.text: Noderr Protocol is a decentralized infrastructure platform enabling secure, scalable, and efficient blockchain operations. We provide enterprise-grade infrastructure powered by Pyth Network for real-time oracle data and NodeGuru for professional validator operations.
Noderr Protocol supports Ethereum, Arbitrum, Optimism, and Base, with plans to expand to additional EVM-compatible chains.

Noderr implements Fortune 500-grade security including comprehensive smart contract audits, rate limiting, DDoS protection, HSM key management, and real-time monitoring. Our infrastructure is operated by NodeGuru with 99.9% uptime SLA.

mainEntity.name: What oracle solution does Noderr use?

acceptedAnswer.text: Noderr uses Pyth Network as its primary oracle solution, providing real-time, high-fidelity price feeds with 400ms update frequency and institutional-grade data from 95+ first-party publishers.
